Title: Mortynight Run
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), David Phillips, Mike McMahan (story editor), David Phillips (story editor), Matt Roller (story editor), Eric Acosta (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Rick and Morty try to save a gas life form while Jerry resides in a daycare made for Jerrys.
